resources.string: When checked, allow ROOT to start Brevent server without \"USB Debugging\"\n\nRequires pay total 4 USD or 20 RMB (via Alipay)
Please pay 4 USD to use \"Allow run as ROOT\".

Please pay 4 USD or 20 RMB to use "Allow run as ROOT".

If you have paid, please open Alipay, click Records, it should be recognized automatically.

If it cannot be recognized, or paid via non Alipay, please send Email with screenshots of payment details.
